name: 'Under' and 'Over' Movies Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.text: This movie stars John Cusack as playwright David Shayne.
questions.explanation:
Bullets Over Broadway.

	This 1994 Woody Allen movie combined gangsters and show business during the Roaring Twenties. Also starring Dianne Wiest, Jennifer Tilly and Chazz Palminteri.

questions.text: James Garner plays a man who discovers that he has two wives in this 1963 comedy.
questions.explanation:
Move Over, Darling.

	James Garner plays widower Nick Arden, who, while on his honeymoon with his new bride (Polly Bergen), finds out that his 'dead' wife Ellen (Doris Day) is still very much alive.

questions.text: This 1963 comedy starred Jack Lemmon as a manager of an apartment building for single women.
questions.explanation:
Under The Yum-Yum Tree.

	This comedy, directed by David Swift, co-starred Carole Lynley as Robin, the new tenant that Hogan (Jack Lemmon) sets his sights on.  Also co-starring Dean Jones as Robin's boyfriend.

questions.text: The main character in this 1986 movie was Lincoln Hawk.
questions.explanation:
Over the Top.

	This action adventure starred Sylvester Stallone as Lincoln Hawk.  Hawk had won the heavyweight championship in boxing and now wants to challenge himself at arm wrestling.  Also starring Susan Blakely and Robert Loggia.

questions.text: Directed by John Cassavettes, this 1974 film focuses on the life of a suburban housewife and her family.
questions.explanation:
Woman Under the Influence.

	Starring Gena Rowlands as Mabel Longhetti as a mother of three who is unable to handle the stress she suffers in her life.  Co-starring Peter Falk.

questions.text: This movie is set at a hotel in 1938.  Starring Chevy Chase and Carrie Fischer.
questions.explanation:
Under the Rainbow.

	This comedy dealt with the chaos that happened to a hotel when it was inhabited by little people and spies during the filming of "The Wizard of Oz".

questions.text: This 1979 movie, starring Burt Reynolds, deals with the aftermath of divorce.
questions.explanation:
Starting Over.

	This romantic comedy stars Burt Reynolds (as newly divorced Phil Potter), who gets kicked out of his marriage to Candice Bergen (Jessica).   He does meet someone new, but of course things don't quite go as planned.

questions.text: In this 1986 movie the main character is a piano player named Christopher Tracy.
questions.explanation:
Under the Cherry Moon.

	Set in the French Riviera, this movie starred Prince as Chrisopher Tracy, the piano-playing womanizer wooing rich women.

questions.text: This musical was a remake of a 1938 movie called "Three Blind Mice" and starred Don Ameche and Betty Grable.
questions.explanation:
Moon Over Miami.

	This 1941 musical comedy starred Betty Grable and Carole Landis as sisters who set out to Florida in search of rich husbands.  Don Ameche and Robert Cummings star as their likely prospects.

questions.text: In this 1992 film, Liam Neeson plays an ex-cop turned private eye.
questions.explanation:
Under Suspicion.

	Liam Neeson stars as Tony Aaron, who unknowingly gets his wife murdered and is framed for the crime.
